mutants.original_line: text = re.sub(r'\'[^\']*\'', '', text)  # remove single quoted strings
mutants.code:
import re

def count_word_occurrences(text, word):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\"[^\\"]*\\"', '', text)
    text = re.sub('#.*', '', text)
    count = len(re.findall('\\b{}\\b'.format(word), text))
    return count

import re

def count_word_occurrences(text, word):
    text = re.sub("\\'[^\\']*\\'", 'MUTATED', text)
    text = re.sub('\\"[^\\"]*\\"', '', text)
    text = re.sub('#.*', '', text)
    count = len(re.findall('\\b{}\\b'.format(word), text))
    return count

def count_word_occurrences(text, word):

import re

def count_word_occurrences(text, word):
    text = re.sub("\\'[^\\']*\\'", '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\"[^\\"]*\\"', '', text)
    text = re.sub('#.*', 'MUTATED', text)
    count = len(re.findall('\\b{}\\b'.format(word), text))
    return count

import re

def count_word_occurrences(text, word):
    text = re.sub("\\'[^\\']*\\'", '', text)
    text = re.sub('\\"[^\\"]*\\"', '', text)
    text = re.sub('#.*', '', text)
    count = len(re.findall(''.format(word), text))
    return count
